name: Set.mul_add_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : Distrib α
s t u : Set α
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (HMul.hMul s (HAdd.hAdd t u)) (HAdd.hAdd (HMul.hMul s t) (HMul.hMul s u))
decl: lemma mul_add_subset : s * (t + u) ⊆ s * t + s * u := image2_distrib_subset_left mul_add

name: Set.add_mul_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : Distrib α
s t u : Set α
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (HMul.hMul (HAdd.hAdd s t) u) (HAdd.hAdd (HMul.hMul s u) (HMul.hMul t u))
decl: lemma add_mul_subset : (s + t) * u ⊆ s * u + t * u := image2_distrib_subset_right add_mul
